bn:00001530n: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)

bn:00078617n: A traditional Muslim headdress consisting of a long scarf wrapped around the head
Man's headdress made by winding a length of cloth round the head.
Man‚Äôs headdress made by winding a length of cloth round the head.
For the millinery fashion, see Draped turban A turban is a kind of headwear based on cloth winding.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the woman wearing a turban emoji features a stylish individual with a light skin tone, her head adorned with a vibrantly colored, intricately folded turban.  Apple's design emphasizes the rich fabric texture and the elegant drape of the headwear, illuminated by a realistic, soft light that accentuates its form and detail.  This emoji represents cultural pride, personal style, and individuality, offering a beautiful and dignified visual statement.
